name: Druidz.io
description:
You are a druid, fighting to claim this newly discovered land as your own sacred grove. 

Using mana, summon sacred flowers with the [1] and [2] keys to defend yourself, and spread your influence, gaining even more mana based on the size of your grove.

Strange Eggs are also randomly appearing, hunt them down and hatch these eggs to gain the loyalty of a powerful creature, ready to defend you with their life.
